U

uiThen(PureAction<In, Out>) - Method in class zyu19.libs.action.chain.AbstractActionChain
 
uiThen(PureAction<In, Out>) - Method in interface zyu19.libs.action.chain.config.ChainStyle
Add a 'PureAction' object, or an "action", in this ChainStyle on the main (UI) thread.
use(ChainEditor) - Method in class zyu19.libs.action.chain.ActionChain
Deprecated.
Use of this function is now discouraged.
The editor of the chain might change the default exception handler, and has to change the i/o flow among current chain's PureActions.
These problems can be avoid by returning a new ActionChain inside a PureAction. This works exactly the same as the way a Promise wait for another promise if that second promise was returned inside the first promise's actions.
